intro.intro-graphs:
It’s nice to meet you,

I'm a web designer, but not the usual sort of web designer.

I code my designs while I'm designing. Designing and coding go great together. Seriously. The design comes alive in the browser. Responsive designs are more responsive. Interactions are more interactive. User Experiences are more experiency. OK, I got a little excited there, but this is pretty fun.

Let’s have fun together.
